dict.string: LocationPal uses your location to show nearby points of interest, attractions, restaurants, and stores on the map while you're using the app. Location data is processed locally on your device and is not shared with third parties for advertising or tracking purposes.

LocationPal uses background location to send you shopping reminders when you arrive near stores you've added to your reminder list. This feature is optional and can be disabled anytime in Settings. Location data stays on your device and is not transmitted to servers or shared with third parties for advertising or tracking.

Location data stays on your device and is not transmitted to servers or shared with third parties for advertising or tracking.
